review: I'm using an Android Tablet. This works for apps such as Youtube, but not to cast browser tabs. I have the latest Chrome browser and installed the Chromecast App. To cast a tab you need the "Cast Extension." In the Play store it's not listed as downloadable, it just has a button that says, "Available on Chrome." Well, I'm already using the latest version of Chrome, and it's not there. After 3 hours of scouring the Net for solutions, I'm returning this. Once they get things straightened out I might try again.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is THE worst product I've ever bought in my entire life. I threw out the receipt thinking how could you possibly screw up such a simple device. Well google managed to. This thing is lucky to hold an internet connection for 35 seconds with the access point 10ft away. It was once able to play a YouTube video for about 45 seconds. I just threw $30 and half a day of my life in the trash. Do yourself a favor, buy an Apple TV or Roku or whatever.
